outputs.output_descr: Ukraine's implementation of the three Rio Conventions on a strengthened policy and institutionally sustainable development baseline will be catalyzed through several interventions. This will involve the preparation of a national Sustainable Development Strategy (SDS) that fully integrates global environmental priorities.  This will be complemented by strengthened key institutional and individual capacities to pursue sustainable development and a targeted public awareness campaign to raise the understanding of the critical linkages between the Rio Convention principles and the more immediate socio-economic development priorities.

project_descr: Integrating Rio Convention Provisions into Ukraine's National Policy Framework
